name: .BBFW File Extension
summary: Learn about .BBFW files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: BBFW files are not meant to be opened. However, those who use the futurerestore app (cross-platform) to upgrade or downgrade their iDevice's firmware can manually specify what BBFW file they want to use while overwriting their device's firmware.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
